item.title: 生存分析
item.dc:creator: Nobukuni Hyakutake
item.description:
1 パッケージの読み込み

library(survival)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

2 データの読み込み

ライフのデータ

dsu01<-read_csv("
  life
  28
  30
  32
  30
  25
  27
  24
  23
  29
  29
  29
  31
  38
  33
  32
  29
  30
  18
  28
  28
  24
  23
  28
  29
  27
  26
  28
  28
  28
  27
  ",show_col_types = FALSE
)
dsu11<-count(dsu01,life) |> 
  mutate(n=n/sum(n))
plot_ly(x=dsu11$life,y=dsu11$n,type='bar')

3 ワイブル

3.1 確率密度関数

weibull_d<-function(m,t,eta){
  k<-(m/eta)*(t/eta)^(m-1)*exp(-1*((t/eta)^m))
  return(k)}

, の場合

m1<-2
eta1<-15
plot(weibull_d(m1,c(1:35),eta1))

3.2 ワイブル分布に従う乱数

i<-rweibull(1000,shape = m1,scale = eta1)
hist(i)

データからワイブルのパラメーターを算出する方法：survregを使う。

t<-survreg(Surv(dsu01$life)~1, dist="weibull")

survregの結果は、上述の確率密度関数のパラメーターとして使うには換算する必要がある。

1/t$scale
[1] 8.057331

exp(unname(t$coefficients))
[1] 29.57896

4 R version

R.version.string
[1] "R version 4.2.2 (2022-10-31)"

5 Python

from reliability.Fitters import Fit_Weibull_2P
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
fail_times = [
9402.7,
6082.4,
13367.2,
10644.6,
8632.0,
3043.4,
12860.2,
1034.5,
2550.9,
3637.1
]
wb = Fit_Weibull_2P(failures=fail_times)
[1m[23m[4m[49m[39mResults from Fit_Weibull_2P (95% CI):[0m
Analysis method: Maximum Likelihood Estimation (MLE)
Optimizer: TNC
Failures / Right censored: 10/0 (0% right censored) 

Parameter  Point Estimate  Standard Error  Lower CI  Upper CI
    Alpha         7965.97         1573.53   5408.78   11732.2
     Beta         1.68128        0.444137    1.0018   2.82162 

Goodness of fit    Value
 Log-likelihood -97.1296
           AICc  199.973
            BIC  198.864
             AD   1.5487 
plt.show()

from reliability.Distributions import Weibull_Distribution
from reliability.Fitters import Fit_Weibull_3P
from reliability.Other_functions import make_right_censored_data, histogram
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

a = 30
b = 2
g = 20
threshold=55
dist = Weibull_Distribution(alpha=a, beta=b, gamma=g) # generate a weibull distribution
raw_data = dist.random_samples(500, seed=2)  # create some data from the distribution
data = make_right_censored_data(raw_data,threshold=threshold) #right censor some of the data
print('There are', len(data.right_censored), 'right censored items.')
There are 118 right censored items.
wbf = Fit_Weibull_3P(failures=data.failures, right_censored=data.right_censored, show_probability_plot=False, print_results=False)  # fit the Weibull_3P distribution
print('Fit_Weibull_3P parameters:\nAlpha:', wbf.alpha, '\nBeta:', wbf.beta, '\nGamma', wbf.gamma)
Fit_Weibull_3P parameters:
Alpha: 28.874744956093892 
Beta: 2.029495367281646 
Gamma 20.38395851616883
histogram(raw_data,white_above=threshold) # generates the histogram using optimal bin width and shades the censored part as white
dist.PDF(label='True Distribution')  # plots the true distribution's PDF

6 ワイブル分布

import numpy as np
import plotly.express as px
def weibull_d(m,t,eta):
  k=(m/eta)*(t/eta)**(m-1)*np.exp(-1*((t/eta)**m))
  return k
m1=2
eta1=15
t1=np.arange(1,36)
d1=weibull_d(m1,t1,eta1)
fig1=px.scatter(x=t1,y=d1)
fig1

7 フィット

from reliability.Fitters import Fit_Weibull_2P
dsu02=r.dsu01
life_max=int(max(dsu02['life']))
dsu03=dsu02['life'].values.tolist()
wb2 = Fit_Weibull_2P(failures=dsu03)
[1m[23m[4m[49m[39mResults from Fit_Weibull_2P (95% CI):[0m
Analysis method: Maximum Likelihood Estimation (MLE)
Optimizer: TNC
Failures / Right censored: 30/0 (0% right censored) 

Parameter  Point Estimate  Standard Error  Lower CI  Upper CI
    Alpha          29.579        0.709558   28.2204   31.0029
     Beta         8.05733         1.02419   6.28047   10.3369 

Goodness of fit    Value
 Log-likelihood -82.1756
           AICc  168.796
            BIC  171.154
             AD  1.48179 
print('Fit_Weibull parameters:\n Alpha(scale η):', wb2.alpha, '\nBeta(shape m):', wb2.beta)
Fit_Weibull parameters:
 Alpha(scale η): 29.578959363748456 
Beta(shape m): 8.057329129027952
import plotly.graph_objects as go
tt="Scale parameter η: "+str(round(wb2.alpha,3))+", Shape parameter m: "+str(round(wb2.beta,3))

ts=np.arange(1,life_max+1)
ta=r.dsu11
fig0201=go.Bar(
        x=ta['life'], y=ta["n"],name='Actual',
        marker={"color": "#99cc66"}
        )
fig0202=go.Scatter(
        x=ts, y=weibull_d(wb2.beta,ts,wb2.alpha), name='Weibull fit',
        line={"color": "#cc6600","width":2},
    )
fig04=go.Figure(data=[fig0201,fig0202])
fig04=fig04.update_layout(annotations=[
  go.layout.Annotation(
    xref="paper",
    yref="paper",
    x=0.03,
    y=0.95,
    showarrow=False,
    text=tt
)
])
fig04
from reliability.Distributions import Weibull_Distribution
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
dsu03=Weibull_Distribution(alpha=15.189, beta=2.032018)
dsu03.PDF(label='dsu01')

       3.19542634e-03, 3.04764589e-03, 2.90567147e-03, 2.90567147e-03,
       2.57639419e-03, 2.27541634e-03, 2.00143676e-03, 1.75308719e-03,
       1.52894723e-03, 1.32755932e-03, 1.14744362e-03, 9.87112423e-04,
       8.45084009e-04, 7.19895670e-04, 6.10115770e-04, 5.14354681e-04,
       4.31274452e-04, 3.59597132e-04, 2.98111685e-04, 2.45679445e-04,
       2.01238140e-04, 1.63804496e-04, 1.32475482e-04, 1.06428308e-04,
       8.49192467e-05, 6.72814483e-05, 5.29218593e-05, 4.13174142e-05])
plt.show()

8 参考サイト

Python package reliability - Fitting a specific distribution to data

item.title: 統計学基礎
item.dc:creator: Nobukuni Hyakutake
item.description:
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)

1 偏差平方和

daa01<-c(5,6,3,5,5,4,5,4)
sum(
  (daa01-mean(daa01))^2
  )
[1] 5.875

2 分散 (標本分散)

sum(
  (daa01-mean(daa01))^2
  )/
  length(daa01)
[1] 0.734375

or

var(daa01)*(length(daa01)-1)/length(daa01)
[1] 0.734375

3 標準偏差(標本分散の平方根)

sqrt(
  var(daa01)*(length(daa01)-1)/length(daa01)
  )
[1] 0.8569568

or

sd(daa01)*
  sqrt(
  (length(daa01)-1)/length(daa01)
)
[1] 0.8569568

4 変動係数

sd(daa01)*
  sqrt(
  (length(daa01)-1)/length(daa01)
)/
  mean(daa01)
[1] 0.185288

5 相関係数

daa02<-c(7,8,3,5,4,3,8,6)
cor(daa01,daa02,method="pearson")
[1] 0.7155814
plot(daa01,daa02)

6 正規分布

curve(dnorm(x,mean=0,sd=1),from=-4,to=4)

7 ヒストグラム

7.1 グラフ

daa03<-hist(daa01)

7.2 度数分布表

tibble(mids=daa03$mids,counts=daa03$counts,density=daa03$density) |> 
  gt() %>%
  tab_header(
    title = "Frequency table",
    subtitle = "daa01"
  )
Frequency table
daa01
mids counts density
3.5 3 0.375
4.5 4 0.500
5.5 1 0.125

item.title: Rを電卓として使う
item.dc:creator: Nobukuni Hyakutake
item.description:
データの型

実数(numeric)、複素数(complex)、文字・文字列(character)、論理値(logical)、空値(NULL)がある。

データの構造

> x<-1    #xに1を代入
> x    #xを表示
> [1] 1    #出力結果

四則演算

内容 記号 例 結果
足し算 + 5+6 11
引き算 - 8-3 5
掛け算 * 3*4 12
割り算 / 12/2 6

R version

R.version.string
[1] "R version 4.2.2 (2022-10-31)"

item.title: Pythonを電卓として使う
item.dc:creator: Nobukuni Hyakutake
item.description:
足し算

1+1
2

引き算

8-5
3

掛け算

8*7
56

割り算

12/6
2.0

割り算の剰余

23%7
2

冪

2**3
8

三角関数

sin

import numpy as np
np.sin(0.2)
0.19866933079506122

cos

np.cos(0.2)
0.9800665778412416

tan

np.tan(0.2)
0.20271003550867248

Python version

import platform
"Python version "+platform.python_version()
'Python version 3.10.7'

item.title: コード入りの投稿サンプル
item.dc:creator: Nobukuni Hyakutake
item.description:
This is a post with executable code.

R-1

library(reticulate)
a<-runif(3)
a<-round(a,2)
print(a)
[1] 0.79 0.63 0.09
b<-"Hello, "

Python

import numpy as np
c="World!"
d=r.b+c
print(d)
Hello, World!
e=np.sin(1.5)*12

R-2

f<-py$e/3
print(f)
[1] 3.98998

R version

R.version.string
[1] "R version 4.2.2 (2022-10-31)"

Python version

import platform
"Python version "+platform.python_version()
'Python version 3.10.7'
